message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product. I believe it's worth a lot, but I'm offering it to you for $140. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $125. Could we possibly meet in the middle?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $125 is a bit too low for me.  Would you be willing to meet at $135?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I am willing to pay $130 for the product. Could we meet at this price?
